title: During a  Call, How Can I Mute and Unmute the Call?
answer:
Through muting or unmuting, the microphone of the phone can be switched off or switched on. To prevent your voice from being heard by the other party, you can mute the call.
? Mute a call: During a call, press the right soft key to display the option menu. Then select Mute and confirm to mute the call.
? Unmute a call: During a call, press the left soft key to display the option menu. Then select Mute and confirm to unmute the call.
